section.title: ChangeLog
section.para: DocBook validation for PHP as console-tool, Validation-result in JSON-format.

listitem.para: bugfix Corrected the date in this ChangeLog. Errors like this can also happen in XMLMind, not just in OpenOffice: <para><date>2010-12-0</date>4</para>
feature Validation of XML-manuals against dtd, what is declared as DOCTYPE in the file
feature "valid" state for every output (true/ false)
feature "stat" statistics-section for timing-info in seconds, parser-name, file size
feature in pom.xml maven-compiler-plugin update so that JDK6 is in use instead of 1.3 and jar-dependencies are really in use
feature Result in JSON-format with parameter --json, dokumentation refactoring and extended for parameters help und --json
feature Filename as parameter and optional the type against it shall be validated
feature project as maven-package with docbookv.sh
